channel.title: Emps Scape Return!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/91fn0o.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/20f3wus.jpg[/img]
[b]Welcome to Emps-Scape Return, We've recently been working on many bugs fixing making the server better, we've been looking for many guides, suggestions, ideas, Updates are being on daily, It has became as the old one, Players are having fun and enjoyable times here, Are you interested and would like to join us? VPS systen is on! Here's the link: [url=http://www.empsscape.smfnew2.com]www.empsscape.smfnew2.com[/url]![/b] Join Forums, Register an account and become a member of Emps-Scape! Players Amout increases everyday!
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2im2pu.png[/img] 1- Can hold 2,000+ players (netty, stable) 2- Redone All Combat System 3- Fixed attack interface clickingButtons: give correct exp 4- Added Walking Check, better walking clipped 5- Player Follow Clipped 6- Player Attack Clipped 7- NPC Walking Clipped 8- NPC Attack Clipped 9- Added easter ring 10- Added MysteryBox 11- Fixed all Duel Arena Dupes 12- Fixed Trade Accept and Decline Dupe 13- Duel Arena 100% 14- Skills Interfaces 100% 15- Flax Picking 100% 16- Bank pin with dialogues 100% 17- Added mining Prospecting 18- Added NPCDefinitions 19- Charged glory 20- Perfect Running Energy Formula 21- Added WaterFilling 22- Mithril Seeds 90% 23- Fixed Diagonal Fighting 24- Fixed all known dupes 25- Working all spellbooks and teleports 26- Added all teletabs 27- Clan chat 80% 28- Fixed deadlocks [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/hs6uxz.png[/img] 29- Added Clipped Firemaking 30- Added Smithing 31- Added Mining 32- Added mining Prospecting 33- Added Herblore plus unfinished potions 100% 34- Added new mining area with ladders 35- Added Cooking skill 100% including[interfaces - new objects] 36- Added Farming 37- Added Woodcutting 38- Added Agility [Gonme agility] 39- Added Crafting [Plus fixing many major bugs] 40- Added Runecrafting 100% [New area - new objects - Npc teleport to the new area] 41- Added Thieving 100% 42- Added Fletching 43- Added Fishing [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/15hjrww.png[/img] 44- Fixed al-kharid gates 45- Added new special attack bar 46- Added staff members login message 47- Fixed the mute- isMuted in connections plus added you're muted in chat[java] 48- Removed the old skillcape shop system 49- Added new skillcape system [items requestments] 50- Added ladder system 51- Added healer [heals your hp and prayer] 52- Added Far magic /Far ranging 53- Instant item appearance in wilderness 54- Perfect enchanting 55- Added new special attack Method [Used to give errors when you click on the speical attack bar] At MeleeSpecial.java 56- Fixed prevent from action processing if walked away without reaching it 57- Real Membership Count Down Days 58- Fixed pjing while you still in combat [now it takes some time to attack the another player] 59- Player vs Player far casting far ranging 60- Commands.java redone - Added over 30 new commands 61- Changed the home location 62- fully Cleaned for quest tab 63- New quest tab with free teleports and more 64- Fixed create ground items method, You can drop any items 65- Added checkDateAndTime - checkTimeOfDay - currentTime and date methods 66- Added Logs ( PMLogs - ChatLogs - DropLogs - CommandsLogs) 67- Added Timedban 68- Added Timedmute 69- Fixing arrow solts 70- Fully Trading logs 100% 71- clipping check for NPC on player 72- Removed all shops in actionhandler 73- Changed every skill location will be find like this example: fishing.Fishing; 74- Fix for First hit instant on NPC's - clicknpc.java 75- Added valueable methods [frame1() -] 76- Added daymute - threedaysmute - weekmute - dayban- threedaysban - weekban commands 77- Added empty - npc - unpc commands 78- Added Smelting 100% 79- Npc never walk on each others 80- Fixed running button [run/walk] 81- Fixed home teleport button for normal spellbook 82- Fixed the prayer tab, It's working 100% with my client 83- Fixed Dharoks anims 84- Fixed items solts 85- Fixed giving wrong items while cutting gems 86- Changed the ShopValue for 1.10 instead of 1.15 87- playerRights 8 staff manger rank 88- Small change the deposit opens bank now 89- Added for ban interface - Bank Inventory - bank equipment 90- Added button for the equipment Screen 91- added skillcapes emotes and gfx with buttons working 92- Fixed all skillcapes solts and customs donaters and other items solts 93- Added donater whips server side specials/walking/running/reqlevels/stats/anims/gfxs 94- Added donater ticket + teleport to the doanter shop and added member ticket 95- Al-kharid gates request 2b insted of 10 gp which doesn't allow players to come in plus added object to make it only for members 96- Fixed items solts 97- working lunar spellbook server side 98- added vengeance lunar spellbook 100% [e.g req/delete runes etc] 99- Fixed bank note and un-note 100- Fixed deposit inventory dupe 101- Fixed bank frame that shows the bank name in the right place 102- Added ladders for new dungeons and added anims for ladders object 103- Fixed commands logs 104- Added otherbank method plus added a command to check other banks for players 105- Al-kharid teleport in quest tab only for members only. 106- Fixed bunny hop anim in the emote tab
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/e7xog1.png[/img] 1. Adding Emps-Wars [Without any bugs and exactly as the old one] 2. Brimhaven agility tickets arena - Agility Shop [Anger Weapons] 3. Adding Multi to wilderness specifically. 4. Quests *Many other goals will be updated soon*
[b]Donations items:[/b] Rare Whips, Santas, H'ween masks, Partyhats..
[B][U][I]Pictures [/I][/U][/B]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2z7rds0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2hwo8dt.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2wnmseb.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2duczu1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/25alqfq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/4hwoko.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/15of8dh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/309r6t0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/29ffjlu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/dptm41.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/ddjbqp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/k00qhv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/mizbpk.png[/img]
[SIZE=5][B]Still not convinced ?[/B][/SIZE] [B]Our server features are vibrant , helpful community with plenty of players on the server , friendly people , perfect combat ,following and protection against cheaters and dupers ,we also have some features that set us a part of the real RuneScape game , including : Castle wars , Duel arena , our custom minigame ,some custom items , and weapons and , different areas!. [/B]

item.title: Emps Scape Return!
item.dc:creator: @hatem hatem
item.description:
@hatem wrote:

:eek: It’s pleasure to hear that from you guys , i just hope to see you ing

Read full topic

item.title: Emps Scape Return!
item.dc:creator: @hatem hatem
item.description:
@hatem wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:7, topic:540910”][quote author=hatem link=topic=659776.msg4411851#msg4411851 date=1394049843]

You really should check it out guys

Did expecting a virus
Got bored looking at the home so logged off


It seems that you are kidding with me ? is that true ?
how the hell that includes virus ?.
You should download it and if you found any warning from anti virus , contact me.
[/quote]
I didn’t say I got a virus lol

Good luck with your server :)[/quote]

Oh well , i understood something else

Thanks anyway we hope to see you ing

Read full topic

item.title: Emps Scape Return!
item.dc:creator: @hatem hatem
item.description:
@hatem wrote:


Welcome to Emps-Scape Return, We’ve recently been working on many bugs fixing making the server better, we’ve been looking for many guides, suggestions, ideas, Updates are being on daily, It has became as the old one, Players are having fun and enjoyable times here, Are you interested and would like to join us? VPS systen is on!
Here’s the link: www.empsscape.smfnew2.com!
Join Forums, Register an account and become a member of Emps-Scape!
Players Amout increases everyday!


1- Can hold 2,000+ players (netty, stable)
2- Redone All Combat System
3- Fixed attack interface clickingButtons: give correct exp
4- Added Walking Check, better walking clipped
5- Player Follow Clipped
6- Player Attack Clipped
7- NPC Walking Clipped
8- NPC Attack Clipped
9- Added easter ring
10- Added MysteryBox
11- Fixed all Duel Arena Dupes
12- Fixed Trade Accept and Decline Dupe
13- Duel Arena 100%
14- Skills Interfaces 100%
15- Flax Picking 100%
16- Bank pin with dialogues 100%
17- Added mining Prospecting
18- Added NPCDefinitions
19- Charged glory
20- Perfect Running Energy Formula
21- Added WaterFilling
22- Mithril Seeds 90%
23- Fixed Diagonal Fighting
24- Fixed all known dupes
25- Working all spellbooks and teleports
26- Added all teletabs
27- Clan chat 80%
28- Fixed deadlocks

29- Added Clipped Firemaking
30- Added Smithing
31- Added Mining
32- Added mining Prospecting
33- Added Herblore plus unfinished potions 100%
34- Added new mining area with ladders
35- Added Cooking skill 100% including[interfaces - new objects]
36- Added Farming
37- Added Woodcutting
38- Added Agility [Gonme agility]
39- Added Crafting [Plus fixing many major bugs]
40- Added Runecrafting 100% [New area - new objects - Npc teleport to the new area]
41- Added Thieving 100%
42- Added Fletching
43- Added Fishing

44- Fixed al-kharid gates
45- Added new special attack bar
46- Added staff members login message
47- Fixed the mute- isMuted in connections plus added you’re muted in chat[java]
48- Removed the old skillcape shop system
49- Added new skillcape system [items requestments]
50- Added ladder system
51- Added healer [heals your hp and prayer]
52- Added Far magic /Far ranging
53- Instant item appearance in wilderness
54- Perfect enchanting
55- Added new special attack Method
[Used to give errors when you click on the speical attack bar] At MeleeSpecial.java
56- Fixed prevent from action processing if walked away without reaching it
57- Real Membership Count Down Days
58- Fixed pjing while you still in combat
[now it takes some time to attack the another player]
59- Player vs Player far casting far ranging
60- Commands.java redone - Added over 30 new commands
61- Changed the home location
62- fully Cleaned for quest tab
63- New quest tab with free teleports and more
64- Fixed create ground items method, You can drop any items
65- Added checkDateAndTime - checkTimeOfDay - currentTime and date methods
66- Added Logs ( PMLogs - ChatLogs - DropLogs - CommandsLogs)
67- Added Timedban
68- Added Timedmute
69- Fixing arrow solts
70- Fully Trading logs 100%
71- clipping check for NPC on player
72- Removed all shops in actionhandler
73- Changed every skill location will be find like this example: fishing.Fishing;
74- Fix for First hit instant on NPC’s - clicknpc.java
75- Added valueable methods [frame1() -]
76- Added daymute - threedaysmute - weekmute - dayban- threedaysban - weekban commands
77- Added empty - npc - unpc commands
78- Added Smelting 100%
79- Npc never walk on each others
80- Fixed running button [run/walk]
81- Fixed home teleport button for normal spellbook
82- Fixed the prayer tab, It’s working 100% with my client
83- Fixed Dharoks anims
84- Fixed items solts
85- Fixed giving wrong items while cutting gems
86- Changed the ShopValue for 1.10 instead of 1.15
87- playerRights 8 staff manger rank
88- Small change the deposit opens bank now
89- Added for ban interface - Bank Inventory - bank equipment
90- Added button for the equipment Screen
91- added skillcapes emotes and gfx with buttons working
92- Fixed all skillcapes solts and customs donaters and other items solts
93- Added donater whips server side specials/walking/running/reqlevels/stats/anims/gfxs
94- Added donater ticket + teleport to the doanter shop and added member ticket
95- Al-kharid gates request 2b insted of 10 gp which doesn’t allow players to come in plus
added object to make it only for members
96- Fixed items solts
97- working lunar spellbook server side
98- added vengeance lunar spellbook 100% [e.g req/delete runes etc]
99- Fixed bank note and un-note
100- Fixed deposit inventory dupe
101- Fixed bank frame that shows the bank name in the right place
102- Added ladders for new dungeons and added anims for ladders object
103- Fixed commands logs
104- Added otherbank method plus added a command to check other banks for players
105- Al-kharid teleport in quest tab only for members only.
106- Fixed bunny hop anim in the emote tab

  1. Adding Emps-Wars [Without any bugs and exactly as the old one]
  2. Brimhaven agility tickets arena - Agility Shop [Anger Weapons]
  3. Adding Multi to wilderness specifically.
  4. Quests
    Many other goals will be updated soon

Donations items:
Rare Whips, Santas, H’ween masks, Partyhats…

[B][U][I]Pictures [/I][/U][/B]













[SIZE=5][B]Still not convinced ?[/B][/SIZE]
[B]Our server features are vibrant , helpful community with plenty of players on the server , friendly people , perfect combat ,following and protection against cheaters and dupers ,we also have some features that set us a part of the real RuneScape game , including : Castle wars , Duel arena , our custom minigame ,some custom items , and weapons and , different areas!. [/B]

Read full topic
